website_summaries.verdict: Stylish and sturdy frame with 10 legs for added support.
pros: With a single hex wrench, assemble a fully-functional bed that enhances the design of your room
High marks for comfort and adaptability, working well for kids and adults
Secured by many parts, and comes with thorough instructions
cons: The assembly may be a bit daunting at first, but the directions are clear

customer_reviews.title: Well Made and Attractive
customer_reviews.text: This just arrived, yesterday. I was a little worried that it might have gotten damaged in shipment, because the box was partially open when I received it, but everything inside the box was in good shape. Assembly was only moderately challenging. The directions consist of a series of diagrams with numbers and letters assigned to each part. It took me about 45 minutes total to put it together, by myself. You only need the hex wrench and the allen wrench that come with the bed - no additional tools. When it was done, I was very pleased. It is exactly as pictured, plus it is very sturdy. I think it will last for years. I would definitely recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: H. E. King

customer_reviews.title: Made for one.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this frame for maybe 3 weeks and the bars have bent. I do not recommend it. I have "getto" rigged it with wood and other things to make it more stable and to bend bars back and such but if you sleep at the wrong angle you have a nice hard bar in your back. For one person this frame should be fine. But dont get this if you have a partner and do NOT have sex on this. Its wobbly and helps it brake. Not a frame i would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Crischill

customer_reviews.title: Works as its supposed to
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something slightly fancy, this was it. It's not a $200 leather frame because I didnt want anything too flashy. It holds up well. My mattress doesnt sink through. Read my reviews to see the mattress I bought. It took a very long time to assemble 2+ hours. But it's not terribly complicated, I just am not used to assembling furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Bruh Bruh

customer_reviews.title: Bed!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bed! It's cute, sturdy, and easy to assemble. Now, when it came in the mail, there was a leg missing. No problem. It happens, you know? The important part is that I contacted the seller, and they were very prompt in responding to and resolving the issue. So, I give it five stars! For a great product and wonderful customer service! Thanks, Winsmooth!
customer_reviews.author: Typo

customer_reviews.title: Great "Cheap" bed frame for kids
customer_reviews.text: I had a metal frame futon when I was a teen/young adult. I was expecting aluminum brazing in structural locations like my futon. However this product turned out to be great. The middle legs are connected to the long bars by big bolts, the brazing only holds the decorations on and if they were to fail shouldn't compromise the structure. I like how the cross bars are just fitted in place with rubber grommets. The instructions are very easy and the bed only took me about 45 minutes to assemble. Another bonus is during installation the 2 long bars and their connectors (4 parts in reality) were the only parts where orientation mattered.
customer_reviews.author: phillip

customer_reviews.title: You won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.text: These beds are great. I bought 2 twins. One for my 3 year old and one for my 6 year old. They work perfect. No squeaking, sturdy, and holds a lot of weight. My father in law is 290 pounds and he slept on it just fine. This bed is AMAZING for the money. I’m so glad I didn’t waste 100’s of dollars on other options like I originally planned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mattress slides on the cross bars.
customer_reviews.text: It's a decent bed and for the price you cant go wrong. It was easy to install as well. Only reason I gave it 3 stars is because the mattress slides on it really bad. I went to wake my daughter up after the first night she slept in it and she had slid a 1/4 of the way off the bed frame on the mattress. The cross bars are metal and finished in a high gloss so it makes the mattress slide very easily. They could have easily added something to the bed frame to prevent this at little cost. Be prepared to put something underneath the mattress to keep it from sliding!
customer_reviews.author: zThe Jokerz

customer_reviews.title: Short support legs. Noisy when u lie on it.
customer_reviews.text: After a very complicated long session of figuring out pieces and putting the bed together we are disappointed with the short support legs. Because they don't touch the floor normally when you sit on the bed they make a noise, and any activity on the bed is noisy and uncomfortable. Apart from that it seems strong and doesn't rock or move except when you lie on it. I think it would have been a great bed if the support legs were the same length as the regular legs.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica A. Marrast

customer_reviews.title: Overall very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice and is easy to assemble. Just be careful putting the cross bars in. It is easy to break the plastic snaps the bars go into (pushing in too hard, I popped it with my fist and it snapped) and then the bed will make a metal on metal noise when you get in. They did take some pressure so finding the right balance is tricky (I bought 2 beds). Note I have not written them to see if I can get a replacement piece.
customer_reviews.author: Cortney M

customer_reviews.title: Legs bending
customer_reviews.text: The bed is pretty sturdy and wasn’t hard to put together. The only thing I hate is the middle and side legs (not the main 4 legs) started to bend which can effect the sturdiness. It’s not bending due to weight it’s bending because the legs are sliding. You WILL NEED furniture protectors because the feet will scratch wood floors. Other than that it’s a pretty nice bed. All parts were included and there were no scratches on the metal.
customer_reviews.author: Nisey

customer_reviews.title: Kind of small, but good for my space
customer_reviews.text: **UPDATE** the bottom support is bent after only a few months use. Waste of money. The frame went together with a little struggle but we made it. One support pole across the bottom didn't have a screw hole. But the rest worked out. It is pictured with a 14" mattress. A thinner one may show off the bed a bit better, but it works.
customer_reviews.author: LacyA

customer_reviews.title: DEFECTIVE PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: Everything was fine until I got to the beams. Two were defective, one of them barely fitted but was too long and made the bed frame bend. The other simply couldnt fit in. The screws they gave were horribly mispacked as there were not enough long screws and too many short ones. Perhaps they gave the wrong size for one of the bed frame. However, i had no choice but to use it anyway since I already throw away my old ones, hoping the new one can function well based on good reviews. Currently, dissatisfied and spending my nights on a wobly bed thinking when and for how long it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Danial

customer_reviews.title: No middle support
customer_reviews.text: So I ordered two of these frames. And did not find out until I put 90% of the frame together that the center support legs LOOK like they should be bolted in (because they have the holes for them) but they cannot be bolted in to support the center of the bed BECAUSE the bars that it should be bolted into have no holes. So I have rigged the frame I was not about to return it I already put it together but I am returning the other frame.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: I am editing this review. Crappy frame
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my teenage son. It sets high enough off the floor to be comfortable just sitting on the bed. I had no trouble putting it together. Very sturdy frame. Comes with the tools needed to put this together. Already recommended it to friends and family. EDIT....After having this bed now for about 6 Months its quite crappy. The frame is always coming lose and I had to tighten it several times now and now most of the screws wont tighten. Now I am looking for something different.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy.... a little tricky to put together though
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews about putting this thing together beforehand! so I was prepared for a long road of construction! my 17 year old daughter and I put it together in under 2 hours! the instructions are just a diagram! no words at all! but it wasn't as bad to put together as we thought! when it is together it is super sturdy! the only issue we had was when putting the bed slats in some were ben from shipping so I had to use a hammer to bend them into shape. Bed looks great and it is sturdy. the videos posted in the reviews of how to put it together really helped! thanks guys.
customer_reviews.author: darren

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our spare bedroom and it's perfect for the space. It's sturdy and was pretty easy to assemble except the nuts weren't threaded right and we had to use pliers to get them to screw in. Other than that I'd recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Downs

customer_reviews.title: is like sleeping on a cloud
customer_reviews.text: I would give this a 10 if i could... Yes, I read some of the negative reviews, and always consider them when purchasing anything from Amazon. That said, this frame, along with my new foam mattress, is like sleeping on a cloud! Absolutely no movement... It did take about a half hour in assemble, but knowing how it was put together, and the strength of the pieces, i don't see any issue in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I LIKE IT
customer_reviews.text: My husband put it together rather quickly. He says it was pretty easy and straight forward. It's a true twin size, it's not shaky at all and most importantly, the kid likes it. The reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is because the silver screws, silver washers and silver connection hardware pieces stick out and look tacky. It's silver everywhere! It would've been nice if the hardware were white like the bed. That color contrast wasn't made evident on the pictures. A quick fix would be to spray paint the hardware to match the color of the actual bed parts, prior to assembling, so that the bed with look uniformed.
customer_reviews.author: Ana_Banana

customer_reviews.title: Dont cut corners with bed frames!!!
customer_reviews.text: Broke after sleeping on it the first night!! So dissapointed and now have to find a sturdier frame. So shocked since I am only 105lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY 💰
customer_reviews.text: Junk had one month and was bending my daughter only weight 112. Braces falling off! Though out!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Came Dented and Chipped!!
customer_reviews.text: I was excited for this order to come because it seems to be a simple and neat bed frame for a cheap price. The disappointing thing is the bed frame came dented and chipped!! I was so disappointed when I saw it. Additionally the the bed was pretty hard to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Waste Your Money.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: pretty easy to put together. Looks ok. Cons: claims to support up to 280(more or less). My daughter who weighs maybe 100 pounds And has only had this bed about 2 months now has bent bars. I suggest not buying unless you’re only planning on using it for a month. Even then you may end up with a squeaky bed with bent bars.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: I didn't expect much considering the price and had just bought these to suffice until I could get a better bunk bed
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 rambunctious and destructive boys. These beds have held up amazingly well. I didn't expect much considering the price and had just bought these to suffice until I could get a better bunk bed, but now I plan on keeping these. They are very sturdy and very easy to put together. You don't even need your own tools as they are supplied with the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Booknerd

customer_reviews.title: Great frame. Buy it
customer_reviews.text: I had a hard time figuring out the directions but with determination I pushed ahead. The only thing I had a problem with was the two security bars that went from headboard to foot. There are four crossbars with holes in them....thats what the stability bars screw into. I figured that out the next day. Once the bed was put together properly lol it's super sturdy. I wasent sure what I was going to get for $88 but I would definitely buy it again. Great frame.
customer_reviews.author: Blessed shopper

customer_reviews.title: Check to make sure you have all the correct pieces before your start assembling.
customer_reviews.text: First box I ordered was missing an important support piece to complete the bed. We Could not take the bed apart to return it without damaging the frame. Could not get a hold of the manufacturer to order the single piece. Amazon customer service did their best to remedy the issue. Got the missing piece after ordering another frame. Frame works great, simple and looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Mercy V.

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: The slats in the middle were not easy to install at all. I had to leave one off entirely because the plastic part was broken then the other side would not insert. Took me 30 minutes to get it off. Luckily it will work for a few years since my child is so small.
customer_reviews.author: kierstin

customer_reviews.title: Overall very satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and a good value not heirloom quality but looks good and you can’t beat the price a lot of assembly required but hey that should be expected it shipped straight to the door. Love the fact that I gain all the under bed storage it fits bins nicely. Overall very satisfied and would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Cute but mattress slides
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our 3 year old... first bed after the toddler bed. It’s really easy to put together, took me about 45min at 7 months pregnant. You will need a little foot stool for toddlers because it is a little high for my daughter to get into the bed. I am happy with this purchase however I gave it 3 stars only because the bottom rails are slippery and the mattress slides... we had to put a textured yoga mat underneath so stop the mattress from sliding. Easy random fix, but a bummer at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa

customer_reviews.title: Bad instructions, not easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Before purchasing please be aware that there are several parts of this bed that will need to be assembled and the instructions are not specific at all. The instructions simply show numbers and pictures. If you're going to get this frame be ready to dedicate at least an hour to putting it together. There were too many pieces and parts and horrible instructions when I bought it, so I ended up returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and in love!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and easy to assemble. Took me about 1hr to assemble. These bed frame is metal and light. It’s perfect for my 7 yr old daughter. Packaging came in great. Small box and wrapping was great. No damages and came in super fast. Love how its a perfect height for my daughter and also to store boxes under. I got it in twin size and no you don’t need a mattress box.
customer_reviews.author: Hernandez D

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and cute
customer_reviews.text: Maybe 45 minutes to assemble with two people and occasional backtracking (instructions have pictures and numbers only, no written instructions, and you need to be sure of what you're doing. We managed in not too long. It holds well, with no noise unless you hit something onto the actual headboard, which will hum like a chime. The headboard and footboard are both a little too tall for my 8-inch-high mattress, meaning sitting at the end is uncomfortable and my pillows are too short to cover all the metal when I want to lean against it. But overall, sturdy, pretty, and silent.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Lassiter

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This bed is more sturdy than other platform beds because it has metal support rods rather than wood slats. However, if you get a thin mattress (8”) you can feel the rods. I had to get my son who is maybe 140 lbs a mattress topper so he didn’t feel them. I think it would be fine with a thicker mattress. It was easy to put together with 2 people.
customer_reviews.author: vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Really nice bed, great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Just finished assembling it three days ago and my daughter has slept on it for two nights. Took me about 45 minutes to assemble with my wife's help. Some of the screws were a tad difficult to initially thread, and the hex bolts thread if you even remotely try to over-tighten them, but I'm still very happy with the purchase for the amount of money I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: samdagiant

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: I was able to put this together in less than an hour. Extremely easy to assemble and has a decent amount of room underneath for storage. Works great in my small room and since it doesn't need a box spring I didn't have to replace my old broken one so it saved me a little money.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Assembly took some time but was not too difficult. Only downfall was that I was short a shorter screw and given an extra long screw. I just used the extra long screw and made it work. The bed is sturdy and does not creak when I toss and turn. It is high enough off the ground that I can store things under the bed. Overall I am not disappointed and happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Catriona M.

customer_reviews.title: Great bed at minimal cost!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of the bed. I bought this for my 11 yr old son and it fits him perfectly. The color is great. Not too feminine and not cheap looking at all. The instructions were a bit too simple but I figured them out. By the way, I'm a 35 yr old female finance manager with a husband that works swing shift and it took me maybe 1 hr to assemble. I will say, I am a bit handy with tools but it wasn't hard at all. I am very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cecelia J. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping, easy to assemble, sturdy & absolutely beautiful bed!!! RECOMMEND!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my teenage daughter & she LOVES IT!!! It’s so simple to assemble that she put it together all on her own with no help whatsoever. She said she couldn’t express enough how much she loves her new bed!!! BEST PURCHASE EVER!!! Highly recommended!!! Super fast shipping & was exactly as described by seller!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer E. Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Buy a non-slip pad along with the bed!
customer_reviews.text: The bed is nice and pretty and easy to assemble. The only problem I didn’t foresee was the mattress moving and sliding off the bed. The slats are round and, along with the metal frame itself, makes it even more slippery. My daughter who is 9 is avoiding to sleep in the bed, afraid of falling off. Would definitely return it if it wasn’t for the unassembling, repacking and re-mailing it.
customer_reviews.author: LETICIA DAYRELL

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: We bought three of these for our triplet girls and WOW! They are sturdy and with that comes some tight fits. I wasn't able to get everything put together by myself, I needed some extra strength from my husband, but if you take your time soon you'll be resting easy. The instructions are super easy to understand and again, wow, on the sturdy. I normally hate metal beds but honestly these may change my mind.
customer_reviews.author: Chella

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived in a timely manner. That’s the one good thing I’ll say. It took me over an hout to put together and the directions were terrible. The quality is terrible too. After my son, 140 pounds, slept on it for a week the bolts began to loosen up and not hold. The bed sagged in the middle because the crossbar gave out and leans slightly. Very uncomfortable- like being folded in a taco.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn P.

customer_reviews.title: Great bed frame for my son
customer_reviews.text: We recently got rid of the loft bed and decided to put my son in a regular twin size frame bed. This thing was very easy to assemble and looks great in his room. Plus, it has enough clearance underneath to store things. Great buy at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Butts

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Got this bc needed a smaller bed for my son. He had my old bed and it was too tall. This is perfect and he doesn't need to have a box spring. There is room under for storage as well if you need it. I know there's a weight limit but my mom sat on this and she is above that limit ... nothing happened. It was perfectly fine! (Don't try this I'm just stating it holds up well 😊)
customer_reviews.author: Casandra Urnikis

customer_reviews.title: New Furniture
customer_reviews.text: I recently moved into a new apartment and decided to leave my old furniture at my parent's home. I purchased two of these beds one for my son, a twin bed, and one for my husband and I, a full bed. Both were easy to assemble and I was a bit worried because some of the negative reviews suggested that the bed creaked somewhat. I've had both beds for at least two months not and so far no creeks and they are very sturdy (my son keeps jumping on his).
customer_reviews.author: Neko Lumina

customer_reviews.title: Sliding mattress
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 3 stars only because the mattress slides. If they added a part that would keep that from happening I would 5 star it for now. Other than that it's cool for the price.
customer_reviews.author: H. Ray

customer_reviews.title: Cheap metal where it counts
customer_reviews.text: Cross bars supporting mattress don’t resist kids playing on the bed. Have 4 bent crossmembers with kinks on the bends. Cheap metal. Use this only for ‘show’ or occasional guest bed. Update: seller is working with us to send parts needed to repair and are seeking to improve.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Spend a few more dollars and get a better bed
customer_reviews.text: Cheap. The rails in on the top have bent, just during installation. I'm sure it wont last long... The instructions suck and the bed rocks. Wish I would of spent a few extra bucks and got a better bed. Not happy at all. Why would the bed rock? Aggravating to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: MraulTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for price
customer_reviews.text: seems like a very good bed. ive had it for about a week. seems sturdy enough. takes 2 people to set up for sure. very comfortable & flat. it is very stylish & looks cute in my room. my only complaint on looks is that it could be just a tad taller. the headboard is kind of short. but it is pretty high off the ground on the legs. overall very nice for the price. recommended
customer_reviews.author: Mikayla

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and nice bed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bed in a Twin size for my 10 year old daughter,She likes it so much.Easy to assemble took our just about half hours. Don’t need a box spring with this bed, just a mattress. Overall its a good buy for the money and I’m glad made the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Decent spare bed or would be good for studio apartment or college dorm room
customer_reviews.text: Decent spare bed or would be good for studio apartment or college dorm room. It wasn’t difficult to put together but there are a lot of pieces. It is rickety and will need to be tightened a few times after sleeping on it for a while. Not very deep so if you have more than a thin mattress on it you won’t be able to see the headboard.
customer_reviews.author: Carmela

customer_reviews.title: It squeaks and not sturdy enough for a long term bedframe.
customer_reviews.text: It's not bad but not good enough for a long term, frequently used bedframe. I bought this for the guest bedroom so it's not used as much. I can't imagine using this for my own bed tho. It squeaks, it moves a lot, and just not sturdy at all. Assembly wise...it was pretty easy, a little confusing at first but there wasn't a lot of parts so that is what made it easy.
customer_reviews.author: Felly

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and is very sturdy!!
customer_reviews.text: This bed is perfect for my daughter. I was concerned about sturdiness and putting it together from the other reviews but I had no trouble setting it up. I set it up in about an hour with no help. It all aligned, you just can’t tighten the screws too much before you get it all together but that’s the same for all furniture in my experience. It’s sturdy, doesn’t shake or wobble & looks great in her room. I definitely recommend it. I am actually going to purchase another one in Black for my son.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: What a task! Will recommend.
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. It was ok putting it together. My son helped. Took about an hour and it’s perfect for him (14). We love the space under the bed for added storage space.
customer_reviews.author: Caprice

customer_reviews.title: Pretty easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I am not a handy person so I was surprised that the bed was not too difficult for me to assemble. The hardest part was inserting the horizontal rods across the frame. They didn't easily insert into the holes/slats provided so I had to do quite a bit of maneuvering to finally get them in securely. Other than that, it was pretty easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: N. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Fine, inexpensive bet but really complicated to put together
customer_reviews.text: I've bought several beds on Amazon (multiple bedrooms to fill) and while this appears to be a decent, durable option for the price, it was absurdly complicated to put together (compared to others I've purchased). It's as if the designer set out with the goal to make the most challenging DIY furniture they could. Unnecessarily difficult.
customer_reviews.author: E Klausmeyer

customer_reviews.title: Worst bed ever!! Poor instructions, poor materials, uncomfortable, the worst.
customer_reviews.text: This is literally the worst thing I ever bought from Amazon. The instructions are garbage, more than half of the parts weren’t labeled. The materials are very poor (several of the rods bent during assembly,) AND it is uncomfortable. If it was something I could take a part and ship back, I would in a heartbeat. Buy anything else. Sleep on a mattress on the floor until you can buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: NMal77

customer_reviews.title: assembly was easy, we are very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of them, the shipping was fast, assembly was easy, we are very pleased! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Marcela Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bedframe for a tween!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bed frame! Sturdy! Super easy to put together. My 11 year old built it with just some minor assistance in less than an hour. For the price its exactly what i was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Never Again
customer_reviews.text: I would not buy this bed it is not strong at all the middle bars don’t touch the floor so there is no middle support I would by this bed if I knew that I would be buy another bed in a couple mouth because this one was not wroth the money
customer_reviews.author: Jen.w

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: while assembling, i realized that this frame cannot be taken back down for moving without destroying it.
customer_reviews.author: jon

customer_reviews.title: A Must Buy
customer_reviews.text: Wow, was I surprised how sturdy this frame was! I got the 'Twin' size, and it fits perfectly with my Twin Mattress. Please follow the instructions, as clearly stated in the 2-paged setup "manual" that comes with the product. It took me about half an hour to setup. Hey for how much it cost, I am very happy with my purchase and would recommend it! I will be updating this review as I continue to use the product more.
customer_reviews.author: Lowkey Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Instructions are not good.
customer_reviews.text: This is cute but the instructions are TERRIBLE. Pay close attention to the instructions because they are not labeled well and the middle slats can NOT be removed once they are placed. They are also only pictures- no words at all. I'm incredibly disappointed in it. You also can't disassemble once it's assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Overall it’s good. It took me and 2 other friends 2 hours to assembly everything. I’ve been using it for 2 months and there is no big problem. The storage space underneath is good for my large suitcases. Take off 1 star because the footboards are not really stable. I think they may not be the same length so it’s a little shaky when I touch or move around.
customer_reviews.author: Binh N.

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal Frame
customer_reviews.text: The frame was not difficult to put together but did take some time to assemble. Some steps could have been done in manufacturing so could take less time to assemble. In fairness, this frame was assembled just after assembling a frame that came out of box in 2 pieces and was put together with 6 bolts, so ease of assembly is altered by that experience. My daugther was a little disappointed in the small size of the head board. It was solid frame when put together.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Moon

customer_reviews.title: Not an XL-TWIN, but looks good!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize our twin bed was an XL mattress, so this bed is very tight to the mattress. It fits VERY snug, but it'll work for now! The assembly took my husband about an hour, but the bed is very sturdy and looks very nice in the bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: jena

customer_reviews.title: Mattress slides off
customer_reviews.text: This bed was easy to assemble, and sturdy. But the mattress slides all over. No rails to hold it. My daughter rolled over in her bed, and the entire mattress slid off.
customer_reviews.author: Gridiron Diva

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: 💯 worth the purchase! It fits our needs perfectly and is worth what we paid. We bought this for our 14 year old daughter. This is no grand bed, is low to the ground and you can’t even see the headboard once her bed is made with pillows and all...who am I kidding here, her bed is rarely ever made 🤷🏻‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Presley

customer_reviews.title: Just Awefull.....
customer_reviews.text: It looks great but thats it.... The middle legs don't stay up & and the bars that hold the mattress bend super bad... So unless u a a small child or an adult under 140lbs I wouldn't recommend this frame at all
customer_reviews.author: randi taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain. Great space under bed.
customer_reviews.text: I assembled this with my daughter with the tool included. No husband necessary to assemble, ;). Easy to put together, looks very nice in her room and so I nexpensive! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Poetryofsound

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Not in love with it. It’s cute but makes a lot of noise and the support beams are shorter so that doesn’t help with the noise problem. Overall I would probably choose another frame if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Behrikis

customer_reviews.title: Support beams defect
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited when I first got this bed but it didn't last very long. The support beams in the middle of the frame are longer than the 4 corner legs. This has caused the support beams to bend and now there's a dip in the frame that I end up in every night. I've tried to straighten out the middle beams, but when I do the 4 outer legs are suspended!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica C

customer_reviews.title: Nice frame, but mattress moves too easily
customer_reviews.text: This is a great frame for the price. Easy to assemble and fits my Full Size mattress well. My only issue is I wish there was something, either tape or some sort of adhesive on the frame, that could be used to prevent my mattress from sliding when leaning on it from the sides. You almost have to get on the mattress slowly because too fast and the mattress moves.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Nunez

customer_reviews.title: Tedious to put together
customer_reviews.text: Tedious to put together. Once you push the slacks in the only way to remove them is by bending the plastic insert so make sure your putting them on the right place before you push down and lock them in. This is only for a small child!
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Crappy Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bed frame to put in a guest room and the first night a guest slept on it the bed legs bent underneath. It’s not sturdy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Harper Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Not worth your money
customer_reviews.text: After buying this bed as a present for my sister, I was excited for her to get a new bed. Unfortunately the box was damaged when it arrived and then when she opened it, it turns out the frames was damaged as well. Then not even 9 months later, the middle legs are bending outwards. Very disappointed in what is supposed to be a steel frame.
customer_reviews.author: Kaiulani

customer_reviews.title: So far i have spent 5 hours trying to get ...
customer_reviews.text: So far i have spent 5 hours trying to get this thing together. The instructions make no sense. Seems there are pieces missing. Dunno...very frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: So for the price of the frame, its good quality. It's sturdy and does the job. The most positive thing I can say about this frame is that I was able to put it together alone a few weeks after having a c-section. The frame itself is not heavy but is sturdy. I would not recommend it for a full-grown adult but it is good for kids and teens.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly.W.

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: One of the legs would not screw on correctly so i just duct taped it on. Other than that I didn't any problems assembling it. You definitely get what you pay for especially because you don't need a box spring and this cost less than one.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy twin bed
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our 4 year old. It is sturdy and not noisy when getting in and out for him. I laid in it to assure it was safe and sturdy and think it is sturdy for adults as well.
customer_reviews.author: Dayna C Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great buy is my second purchase I bought the black for my youngest daughter and white for my son and they are well made and worth the buy
customer_reviews.author: Peaches42391

customer_reviews.title: Strong and stylish
customer_reviews.text: The frame is great looking and is rather sturdy looks just like the pictures. I have had it for a month and it’s great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri K

customer_reviews.title: Decently nice!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty decent little bed! Way more sturdy than I expected. The weight limit says 70lbs and I'm welllllllll above that and didn't break it😅 it's cute and pretty nice for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Makeup Momma

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad item. It works.
customer_reviews.text: Should have written instructions, pictures don't always help and the screws were all mixed together with their corresponding letters just stuck to the baggie they were in. Otherwise it is working for its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: T. Roach

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Directions are horrible, took hours to set up , missing several bolts needed and when finally assembled it fell apart as soon as I put a mattress on it. Too much of a pain to re-package and then send back. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Had issues at first
customer_reviews.text: Got the package on a Thursday morning and started putting it together immediately. Halfway through, came across having incompatible parts. Contacted seller and got a response same day saying they'll ship out the necessary part that was missing. Two business days later the part showed up, everything is in place, and the bed is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: RUTH S.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and quiet.
customer_reviews.text: This bedframe was pretty easy to assemble. I have arthritis in most of my fingers and put it together by myself. I made sure to tighten all of the screws after the frame was put together and I did use a hammer to tap the cross bars in to place. When I ordered it, my only concern was whether or not it would be noisy when moving around in the middle of the night. It is quiet. It is all very sturdy. I bought the twin frame for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy from PA

customer_reviews.title: Relatively easy assembly...
customer_reviews.text: ...and comes with all the tools you need to assemble it, so don't run out and buy a toolkit like I did. Tight fit for a pillow top mattress, but once it's in there, it definitely won't slide around. Seems relative sturdy considering I'm an adult; would assume it could handle anything a kid could throw at it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Shemwell

customer_reviews.title: Easy and cute
customer_reviews.text: I had it assembled by myself in about 30 minutes! Very cute, lots of under bed storage space. I will update with how it holds up!
customer_reviews.author: BrieC

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, but needs professional assemblage
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to assemble, but I’m also not a novice when it comes to putting bed frames together. It took me a couple of hours to complete. I highly recommend spending the extra money to have a professional assemble it.
customer_reviews.author: Littlepetite80

customer_reviews.title: Great bed frame for price
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was pretty easy. Let's just say, if I can put it together anyone can. It is very sturdy. It's nice not to have a boxspring. My daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Vera Murdock

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly difficult to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This is incredibly difficult to assemble. A lot of the parts aren’t labeled but look alike and if you do use the wrong one it’s really hard to fix. Many of the screws don’t work very well and strip easily. I spent almost 4 hours assembling and disassembling it to try to get it right and there are still sections that I still can’t get to screw in. At this point I’ll just be happy if it doesn’t fall apart in the middle of the night.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's steady.
customer_reviews.text: Strong. But I didn't know it was so high , not safe for toddlers. I bought it to not have my babies nap in the mattress on grandma floor in the guess room.
customer_reviews.author: Brendaliz Rosado

customer_reviews.title: pretty good
customer_reviews.text: According to the instructions of the drawings, the installation is a bit simple, and it took about two hours for two people to work together. The bed frame will not wobble for two people lie down .
customer_reviews.author: ak

customer_reviews.title: Don't do it.
customer_reviews.text: Missing piece that hooks onto bed frame not there so had to take it takes 5 hours to out it together comes in single pieces very complicated to put together and very flemsey plastic def not metal and it's small not for an adult more of a kids bed.nit taken it so part which once you get the box spring poles in ha have fun getting them out waste of money don't but this.
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great Bed for a young teen
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and very sturdy. High enough off the ground for under storage. My daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.author: DML74

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The quality is not very well, they missing the nails, and the nail quality so poor, when I put the wrong way wanna reset again, but nail is not working, it can not take out..actually I wanna return it, but the box is already throw away and we can’t take out the nail..so we just keep it...
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Adaptable
customer_reviews.text: I had this put together by myself within 45 minutes. Looks really good too and for any type of environment it's put in. Doesn't rattle or squeak and holds solid. All around good sturdy and eye appealing bed frame.
customer_reviews.author: Brady R Haslam

customer_reviews.title: Nice bed frame for my son's room
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, exactly what I wanted. Some people had a hard time with parts not lining up right. With metal beds I've found it is best to put everything together very loosely, then come back and tighten the screws once assembled. Sounds time consuming but it's definitely worth it in the end. I've never had a problem with things lining up right when I do it this way.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany S.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible. Horrible do not order this crap
customer_reviews.text: Worst bed ever. Literally not even a month after having it the middle legs bent and so did one of the support beams and it’s been wobbly and the bed literally is just a piece of crap. So upset I’ve spent so much money it. I weight Less than 200lbs and the bed couldn’t withstand my weight. Hate this product never again will I buy
customer_reviews.author: taylor ramlal

customer_reviews.title: A great buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: This bed is wonderful. I bought it for my grand daughter to use in our home when she visits. It is sturdy and elegant looking. I am very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Michaela  Reyes-Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Probably better for more gentle, light eight people
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in hippies it would withstand my heavy duty child who likes to flop into beds, but it was destroyed within hours of being assembled. May work better for light weight, gentle people.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper Mom

Nabs;? the steel bed frame features providing solid support for the mattress as well as even body distribution for a restful nights sleep. Nabs;? the Metal slats can curve downwards and adjust to fit your body and your sleeping position. The standard Height is suitable for a standard size bed skirts. Takes less than 60 minutes to assemble. Package includes:* carton* instruction for installation* polybag* screw* components
